name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dota 2 Stone Logo: Icon of the Ancients Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the iconic Dota 2 stone logo in this live wallpaper, featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals, and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
